TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BuildProviderAppliesTo extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the locations where the attribute is respected during code generation for a resource by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> object provides functionality to parse a particular file type and generate code during compilation of a resource. A build provider generates code for those resources that correspond to the ttribute attribute and which have the extension mapped to the build provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo All = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the build provider generates code for resources wherever the resources are found. This is the default value for the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo Code = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the build provider generates code for only those resources in the \App_Code directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo Resources = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the build provider generates code for resources in the \App_GlobalResources and \App_LocalResources directories.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderAppliesTo Web = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the build provider generates code for only those resources in Web content directories, which are directories other than the reserved ASP.NET directories \App_Code, \App_GlobalResources, and \App_LocalResources.
